tldr: Affected versions of this package do not properly sanitize Markdown, allowing script tags to remain unfiltered during rendering. This makes the package vulnerable to cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks, potentially enabling attackers to inject and execute malicious scripts in the rendered content.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@nuxtjs/mdc` library to a patch version.
